== Quotes ==
{{Quote|"Spook up your base with Scary Furniture Add-On! Craft self-rocking chairs, Mimic chests, a possessed Creeper doll, creepy music boxes, haunted portraits, and more! Each furniture piece hides spooky surprises that will shock your friends. Decorate your base and see who get's scared first! Includes 16 furniture pieces and works in any world!"
|Minecraft.net description}}
